subject: Re: [junit] Re: Are you really using JUnit during your development?
msgSnippet: ... And their products contain an incredible amount of bugs. They are only still in business because their customers are used to dealing with bugs. Once they
messageBody:
CÃ©dric Beust:

> Because a lot of software companies are still in business and I know for a
> fact they don't do a lot of testing :-)

And their products contain an incredible amount of bugs. They are only
still in business because their customers are used to dealing with bugs.
Once they learn that they don't have to accept them, those companies
will be in real trouble.

I'd rather work for a company that *creates* that trouble for their
competitors...

Take care, Ilja
